title: Monday Mini: The Trouble with Complimenting Weight Loss
itunes:title: Monday Mini: The Trouble with Complimenting Weight Loss
description:
Weight loss is not always a good thing, yet it's often something that is complimented. Anney and Samantha dig into why it's complicated. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
